citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
An expired bottle of vitamin B complex (expired February 2023) was found and confirmed to have been given to a sea lion
the day prior. Expired medical products are not an appropriate method to prevent disease and injury in animals. The
licensee must ensure appropriate methods are in place to prevent, control and treat diseases and injuries, which includes
the use of unexpired drugs and checking expiration date before administration of medical products.
Corrected at time of inspection dated 26 April 2023.

At time of inspection, assorted tools, bikes, and household clutter are leaning against the wall and on the bottom floor of
the conveyance housing 2 California Sea Lions and 1 South American Sea Lion. The sea lions can freely access this area
by going down the steps of the platform after exiting the outdoor pool area. Storing items in the enclosure poses a risk of
injury to the animals. Facilities for marine mammals must be structurally sound and must be remained in good repair to
protect the animals from injury.
Correct by 5 May 2023.
The 5:30pm show was observed at the Pima County Fair located in Tucson, Arizona. Unit 3: "Cruise" was inspected.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
An expired bottle of vitamin B complex (expired February 2023) was found and confirmed to have been given to a sea lion 
the day prior.  Expired medical products are not an appropriate method to prevent disease and injury in animals. The 
licensee must ensure appropriate methods are in place to prevent, control and treat diseases and injuries, which includes 
the use of unexpired drugs and checking expiration date before administration of medical products. 
Corrected at time of inspection dated 26 April 2023. 
3.101(a)(1) 
   
Facilities, general. 
At time of inspection, assorted tools, bikes, and household clutter are leaning against the wall and on the bottom floor of 
the conveyance housing 2 California Sea Lions and 1 South American Sea Lion. The sea lions can freely access this area 
by going down the steps of the platform after exiting the outdoor pool area. Storing items in the enclosure poses a risk of 
injury to the animals. Facilities for marine mammals must be structurally sound and must be remained in good repair to 
protect the animals from injury. 
Correct by 5 May 2023.

The 5:30pm show was observed at the Pima County Fair located in Tucson, Arizona.  Unit 3: "Cruise" was inspected. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
